title: LF Someone to climb out of bronze with
body: Looking for a player to help me get out of bronze and teach me some stuff along the way you can be in silver or bronze idc coz together we can do it. If you are interested add me and say you are from the board

replies.body:
i play all roles

main pref mid/adc , champs i use
mid - diana , ahiri. akali
adc - trist, mf, lucian
supp-braum,leona,lulu
top-fiora,irelia
jg-xin zhao,khazix,irelia,elise

stuck in b5 as i coudnt carry hard enough last season s3.

pros : great at making teamfights/plays
will communicate well with team
mechanics are great
level of champ understanding listed above high

cons: possibility of flaming and tiliting due to possible win conditions
sometimes get cocky when ahead
weak late game

ign: AfterEffect
Hey i'm also interested in climbing out off bronze. I'll add you and we can discuss.
Harpii gold acc add me and my bronze acc Bunjii
I am interested in your offer. I can play any lane but preferably top or mid. I added you.
